locations.name:
Corey's 
House
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
A rundown suburban family home, crumbling drywall and broken windows spread around a boy with a deadly smile.
barks: I liked it better underground, when the corpses were just burned.
It's lonely out here.
Do you wanna play ball? I have just the thing...
I'm fine, just buy what you need and leave me alone.
No, I don't know where my parents are. Not anymore.
I just wanted to play my Gametoy, but they wouldn't listen...

locations.name:
Viana's 
Grange
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: Don't  you sass my cows, trader. God knows I have enough of that around here already.
It's rainning now, but it will stop raining some day. Good thing we are preppers.
I'm about to start a revolution!
It's a commune,  trader! Ha a commune...
I'm all good in the hood, trader. As long as the boys over at Ft. Lieber look out for us, we'll be fine.
Hit Fort Lieber recently? Cpt. Measly is kinda cute.

locations.name:
BUY USED TV 
SETS NOW!1!!
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: These are not our heads, trader, it's just our corporate-mandated uniform. It's both a marketing stunt AND a metaphor.
We are hungry.
Our radio marketing strategy is working! We are moving units like crazy!
Say can I interest you in a modern, state-of-the-art, used TV set? It's a steal! On that note, please don't steal from us.

You'd have thought that technological progress would have stopped when we went underground, but BOY were you wrong! Have you heard of the Beat a Maxx? I'm telling you the guys in Paradize are all over this trinket!

locations.name: Fort Lieber
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: Captain Measly reporting for duty!
Finest goods in Happy Valley, hand selected by the troops. What's left of us, anyway.
Had shootout with Los Treze last week. They're getting bolder. You stay away from them, trader.
I'll ram you with my whole fleet if you try to steal from us.

locations.name: Paradize
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: We can ~stroke~ the brain out of your skull, trader.
I have a ~liver~ recipe I've been wanting to try.
Our tribe has ~licked~ the eyes of God. We ate his sight, now we can see.
There's a herectic in van up North. He's due to face ~baptism~ by the Fire Tongue.
You are welcome to sleep here tonight, traveller, free of charge.
The Dullard Cult welcomes your goods, trader!
Do you want to hear with tips of your ~skin~, traveller?
Wear your mask at all times in Paradize. Tis the Sight's Law.
Not every trader is friendly. Some are ~starving~ for a soul.
One day we might not let you leave.

locations.name: Wind Autumn
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: I can't believe we missed all this for so long. It's like a dream.
I remember the world from before. Maybe we were due for a reset.
I'm not sure what to do with all this freedom. But I know I want to stay here now.
Love is the strongest currency, child! And I'm rich!

locations.name: Gas Station
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: Have my money yet?
You know, your dad was a little bitch.
Do not cross Carlos Treze!

locations.name: El Asco
locations.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
barks: Hola, trader. Pick your poison. Mine is innocence.
No trouble, trader, por favor
No doi m√°s, I'm done with this heat.
May you find a friendly fate, trader.
Bottom's up!
Let me know if you need an angel shot.
Dullard boys don't come this way at all. Their god won't let them drink.
Can't believe what they did to you... Mi nieto, Carlos
